^xE05030^xD02090^xC8C8C8Come to my stream ^x7070FF^xB97123twitch.tv/tripolarbear^7^7 to hang out and see my builds in action Subscribe to ^xB97123youtube.com/tripolarbear^7
STEP BY STEP LEVELING AND HAND HOLDING ON MY MAXROLL ARTICLE: ^x8888FFhttps://poe.maxroll.gg/build-guides/boneshatter-slayer^7
^xD02090^x70FF70====== LEVELING TREE NOTES =====^7^7
Vendor a ^xFFFF77rare Rustic Sash^7, a Blacksmith's Whetstone and the highest level two-hand Axe you can find.
IMPORTANT! Vendor Unidentified items for Transmutation shards. Use Transmutation orbs to craft resistance on all your gear.
Solve mana issues with Mana leech OR a Mana flask!
Thanks sh4rpie#6581 for making the all in one POB
^x70FF70====== ENDGAME TREE NOTES =====^7^7^7
BODY ARMOUR 1. Purchase an Item Level: 86 Full Dragonscale with a Fractured Resistance (if you can find one). If you can't find a Fractured Resistance, try a different Armour/Evasion base type. If you can't find any Fractured Resistances, purchase a 6-linked base instead. 2. Purchase ~10 Essence of Insanity and roll on your Body Armour until you hit 25%+ chance to Suppress Spell Damage. On average, this takes 25 Essences, but you may get lucky. Higher Suppression chance here allows your other gear to have lower rolls. 3. If there's an open Suffix, craft Suffixes Cannot be Changed and Harvest Reforge Lightning rolling for 30%+ to Lightning Resistance. 4. Craft Life or, if you have more Currency, use a Lesser Eldritch Ember to make the ONLY influence on your item Searing Exarch's. This means the Searing Exarch is Dominant. Use Eldritch Chaos Orb to reroll your Prefixes until you obtain 80+ to maximum Life. 5. Once you've gotten a good Life roll (80+) craft % increased maximum Life. 6. If you have the currency, you can roll your Influenced Implicits, talked about in Milestone 9.
BELT 1. Purchase an item level 86 Stygian Vise base 2. Use an Orb of Scouring and Fertile Catalyst on it. 3. Purchase a Hunter's Exalted Orb and slam it onto the belt. 4. Buy ~46 Pristine Fossils and Resonators for T2 flat Life, or 92 Pristine Fossil and Resonators for T1 flat Life. 5. Use these fossils until you obtain T1 flat Life, and T1 % increased Maximum Life. You can get unlucky here, but if it's getting bad you can stop at T2 flat Life, and T1 % increased Maximum Life. 6. Once you get good Life rolls, you?re done. However, you can increase the value of your Belt if you have an open Prefix. Craft Prefixes Cannot be Changed and Harvest Reforge Critical modifiers for Gain a Flask Charge when you deal a Critical Strike, or Harvest Reforge Chaos for #% increased Chaos Damage. 7. Now you have full prefixes (3). If your suffixes are good, you can sell it or use it. If they're full then Reforge Keeping Prefixes until you can craft a Suffix. Craft Prefixes Cannot be Changed and Reforge Chaos for 20%+ chaos resistance. If you get awful Chaos Resistance or other bad suffixes, re-do step 6. 8. You have 3 good prefixes, and 20%+ Chaos Resistance. Craft Prefixes Cannot be Changed and grind out an T3 Aisling in research. Do your Catarina fight to make Aisling T4, or get a T4 Aisling from someone else. Aisling will replace a random modifier with a Veiled mod. We want her to replace our craft, and not Chaos Resistance, so if she removes Chaos Resistance go back to step 6. Once she removes Prefixes Cannot be Changed, craft a Resistance to block all resistances from being Unveiled, and Unveil Dexterity + Intelligence. Prioritise Intelligence if given the choice, but both are needed to have the highest level gems. 9. Once you have Chaos Resistance and the Veiled mod, all you do now is craft a Resistance. Now you should have 3 amazing Prefixes, and 3 decent Suffixes for a full 6 mod rare belt!
AXE CRAFTING 1. Grab an Item level 83 (Higher than 83 is WORSE) Despot Axe and Perfect Fossil it until it's 28%+ Quality. 2. Spam Deafening Essence of Contempt until you obtain one of the following: 3. T3+ Hybrid (#% increased Physical Damage AND +#to Accuracy Rating as ONE mod) 4. T3+ #% increased Physical Damage 5. If you obtained Hybrid, move onto step 4. If you got the pure Physical Damage roll, craft increased Attack Speed and sell it. Start over from step 1 with a bit of your currency back. 6. If you have 1 Prefix open, then Craft Prefixes Cannot Be Changed. You need to Annul if you don't have a Prefix open. If you don't have a Suffix open, craft a random Prefix and Harvest Reforge Keeping Prefixes. 7. Purchase a Veiled Orb Check to see if you hit a Prefix or Suffix "Veiled" mod. 8. Prefix = Unveil into (120-139)% increased Physical Damage, (21-25)% chance to Impale Enemies on Hit with Attacks, or one of the other Physical Damage mods. 9. Suffix = Craft % increased Damage per Endurance/Power/Frenzy Charge to block these from being Unveiled, and then Unveil into an increased Attack Speed craft or Double Damage craft. DO NOT Unveil the Blood Rage craft. Then craft #% increased Physical Damage (if you still have a Prefix open). 10. If you landed the Prefix Unveil into the Physical Damage modifier, your prefixes should now be full of flat, hybrid and a normal increased Physical Damage. Craft Prefixes Cannot Be Changed again, and Harvest Reforge Speed until T2+ increased Attack Speed. 11. Craft Double Damage (normal or while focused). Then use a Warlord's Exalted Orb to hit a Suffix increased Physical Damage or Weapon Range. 12. Congrats! Your weapon is now complete!
^xD02090====== ACCURACY =====^7^7^7^7
For the endgame tree, it is important to keep an eye on accuracy rating vs life (as you MFers would remember if you paid attention to the video!) One way to achieve this is to add an accuracy roll to your ^xADAA47Reduced Effect of Shock Ring^7

Skill.label: Herald of Ash, Purity, and War Banner
Spectral Throw - Bleed - Volley - Fast attack
NEW AURAS = Determination + Herald of Ash
Ancestral Cry on Left Mouse Button
Ancestral Cry - Call to Arms (PoB Gem Update soon)
Weapon 1: Ancestral Cry - CALL TO ARMS
Helmet too: Don't need if enough accuracy
Helmet: Precision Lvl = Whatever you need for PT
